channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Failure of Veolia street sweeper to clean inner circle, 21st November
item.description:
Yet again, I am having to report that the Veolia street sweeping vehicle fails to clean the inner side of the turning circle at the end of Little Thrift. The ONLY drain in this turning circle is located on the inner side and failure to sweep it leads to blockage due to fallen leaves and water fails to drain away (see photo). Surely the council's contract with Veolia is to clean both sides of the road - only once have I seen this happen and I subsequently made a positive report to commend the driver! Come on Bromley - get behind Veolia and tell them to do the job properly, even if it means going to the end of our very short cul-de-sac and coming back again to complete the job!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Thrift, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
